tabs.highlight: string - Name of item to highlight.
string - Name of item to highlight.

visible: boolean - true if the panel is visible.

pathDescription.isLink: boolean - true if it's a link.
pathDescription.isFile: boolean - true if it's a file.
pathDescription.name: string - Name of item.
pathDescription.isLocal: boolean - true if filesystem is local

servers.name: string - Name of server
servers.storePassword: boolean - true if password is stored.

servers.name: string - Name of server
servers.privateKeyPath: string - Path to file with private key.
servers.storePassword: boolean - true if password and passphrase are stored.
servers.loginWithPassword: boolean - true if password should be used. false for private key.
servers.usePassphrase: boolean - true if the passphrase must be used to decode the private key.
